thread.title: 29 Guys Who Definitely Made You Thirsty In 2007
thread.title_full: 29 Guys Who Definitely Made You Thirsty In 2007

author: Jenna Guillaume
title: 29 Guys Who Definitely Made You Thirsty In 2007

organizations.name: getty images between high school musical

text:
View this image ›
Peter Kramer / Getty Images The OC ended in 2007, but Seth Cohen is forever.
ID: 10328381 2. Pete Wentz View this image ›
Bryan Bedder / Getty Images 2007 was peak Wentz.
ID: 10327877 3. Michael Cera View this image ›
Kevin Winter / Getty Images With leading roles in Superbad and Juno , Michael Cera’s adorkable charms were kinda irresistible.
ID: 10326778 4. The Gossip Girl guys. View this image ›
Scott Wintrow / Getty Images Ed Westwick, Chace Crawford and Penn Badgley may or may not have been one of the main reasons to tune in to the show.
ID: 10326842 5. Gerard Way View this image ›
Sean Gallup / Getty Images Every emo’s fave.
ID: 10328298 6. Zac Efron View this image ›
Kevin Winter / Getty Images Between High School Musical 2 and Hairspray , Zac really owned ‘07.
ID: 10326775 7. Corbin Bleu View this image ›
Vince Bucci / Getty Images Zac wasn’t the only guy grabbing attention in HSM 2 .
ID: 10326777 8. Wentworth Miller View this image ›
Mark Davis / Getty Images Remember when everyone was obsessed with Prison Break ?
ID: 10327874 9. Adrian Grenier View this image ›
Stephen Lovekin / Getty Images Lol remember Entourage ?
ID: 10327873 10. Ryan Sheckler View this image ›
Scott Gries / Getty Images The skateboarder got his own reality show this year.
ID: 10327876 11. Emile Hirsch View this image ›
Frazer Harrison / Getty Images Still not over Into the Wild tbh.
ID: 10326855 12. James McAvoy View this image ›
Frazer Harrison / Getty Images Also not over Atonement.
ID: 10326856 13. The Jonas Brothers View this image ›
Scott Gries / Getty Images So much hair.
ID: 10326786 14. Elijah Kelley View this image ›
Bryan Bedder / Getty Images He basically stole the show in Hairspray.
ID: 10326866 15. Milo Ventimiglia View this image ›
Frazer Harrison / Getty Images He followed up his role as Jess on Gilmore Girls with Peter on Heroes , aka another dreamboat.
ID: 10327867 16. Sendhil Ramamurthy View this image ›
Frazer Harrison / Getty Images As Mohinder on Heroes he was the ultimate science bae.
ID: 10327866 17. Patrick Dempsey View this image ›
Scott Gries / Getty Images Not only was he McDreamy, he was also better than a prince in Enchanted.
ID: 10326852 18. Dave Annable View this image ›
Frederick M. Brown / Getty Images Remember Brothers and Sisters ?
ID: 10327864 19. Pharrell Williams View this image ›
Evan Agostini / Getty Images Long before he drove everyone a bit nuts with “Happy”.
ID: 10327859 20. Josh Duhamel View this image ›
Evan Agostini / Getty Images He made the leap from TV to movies with Transformers.
ID: 10326844 21. Shia LaBeouf View this image ›
Frederick M. Brown / Getty Images Transformers was huge and so was Shia.
ID: 10326847 22. Amaury Nolasco View this image ›
Frazer Harrison / Getty Images Another Transformers star, he was also popular on Prison Break.
ID: 10327863 23. Matt Damon View this image ›
Francois Durand / Getty Images The Bourne star took out People’s Sexiest Man Alive in 2007.
ID: 10326857 24. Shemar Moore View this image ›
Pascal Le Segretain / Getty Images He’s always been ~criminally~ good looking.
ID: 10327850 25. Chad Michael Murray View this image ›
Vince Bucci / Getty Images Lucas was the worst character on One Tree Hill , but CMM was still a babe.
ID: 10328312 26. Matt Corby View this image ›
Kristian Dowling / Getty Images One of the greatest things to come out of Australian Idol .
ID: 10328284 27. 50 Cent View this image ›
Scott Gries / Getty Images He unleashed Curtis in 2007.
ID: 10328353 28. Gerard Butler View this image ›
Mj Kim / Getty Images He showed off his abs in 300 and his heart in PS I Love You.
ID: 10326868 29. Brody Jenner View this image ›
Stephen Shugerman / Getty Images There was actually a time he was more famous than his sisters.
ID: 10328324
 More News About Michael Cera, Adam Brody, Brody Jenner, Zac Efron, Gerard Butler, Matt Damon, Shia Labeouf Jenna Guillaume is Editor-at-Large for BuzzFeed and is based in Sydney.
